issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We update the last.repl.id as a database property. This is done after all the bootstrap tasks to load the relevant data are done and is the last task to be run. however we are currently not setting up the DAG correctly for this task. This is getting added as the root task for now where as it should be the last task to be run in a DAG. This becomes more important after the inclusion of 
HIVE-17426 since this will lead to parallel execution and incorrect DAG's will lead to incorrect results/state of the system.
fields.summary: Correct DAG for updating the last.repl.id for a database during bootstrap load

ATTACHMENT ID: 12894681 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Couple of comments:
1. Can you take a note what problem did you see if updating database last.repl.id earlier? Is that some bootstrap tasks get skipped?
2. Name EfficientDAGTraversal, do we have a regular DAGTraversal? If not, probably just leave DAGTraversal is better; DependencyCollectionFunction, might be better AddDependencyToLeaves?
3. How about createEndReplLogTask? Shall we do it after all tasks as well?
